description: This file is a Python source code file that defines a ClickUp agent with specific instructions and interactions for managing tasks and spaces via the ClickUp API. It imports modules, creates an agent instance, and demonstrates usage with print_response calls.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured to perform tasks with specified tools and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interfacing with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: ClickUpTools
classes.description: Tools class providing methods to interact with ClickUp API functionalities.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response from the agent, optionally formatted in markdown.
